item.title: New Marathon Community Playtest Announced, Still No Release Date
item.content:encoded:
With Marathon‚Äôs most recent Closed Technical Test behind it, a new Community Playtest has been announced. Details are already available on how to sign up, but it brings more focus on the fact that there‚Äôs no sign of a Marathon release date.

October‚Äôs Marathon Closed Technical Test is done. Bungie has inevitably learned valuable data about the extraction shooter, and Insider Gaming has reported before that Sony has confirmed that Marathon will launch by March 2026.

We‚Äôre one step closer to another test, but no closer to knowing when before March 2026 the full release will happen.

The official Marathon website is now advertising and recruiting for the ‚ÄòMarathon December Community Playtest‚Äô taking place in December 2025.

You can try out the latest extraction shooter build for yourself. It‚Äôs playable across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam, and Bungie has said this:

‚ÄúThe Marathon December Community Playtest will run from December 12th to the 15th from 2PM PT to 8PM PT each day.‚Äù

Like before, the playtest is under a strict NDA, so you can‚Äôt share your footage or experience. It‚Äôs only for North America, so if you‚Äôre based outside of here, you‚Äôll have to wait for the next one!

It‚Äôs true that leaks from the recent Closed Test were positive. However, Bungie needs to commit to a release date soon and has to make sure it can compete with the dominance of ARC Raiders and Escape From Tarkov.
